title: K-12 Workshop on Designing and Applying an Online Education Quality Assessment Model

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online learning environments and basic scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: Development and application of an online education quality evaluation model using the PDCA cycle in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can design online education quality evaluation frameworks by applying the four stages (Plan-Do-Check-Act) of the PDCA model.
Learners can develop three or more quality metrics optimized for mobile environments in project-based learning.
Learners can propose continuous improvement plans for online education by combining peer and self-assessment.

resources: Collaborative Learning Management System (LMS) Sample Template
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
